goal.ch: The majority of humanity lives in cities, in more or less densely settled areas, in which congestion and traffic is a key problem. This course will provide an understanding of the millenia old problems related to urban traffic, modern challenges by individual motorized transport and even newer solutions provided by web-based information technology. Or, in a nutshell: To understand the dilemma of modern cities in which cars are a necessity and a curse and to understand the different approaches to ensure mobility and liveable cities.
